subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Elliot Driben, who suffers from cerebral palsy, has attended more than 5,000 B.U. sporting events and has earned honors and reciprocal loyalty from the university community.
snippet: Elliot Driben, who suffers from cerebral palsy, has attended more than 5,000 B.U. sporting events and has earned honors and reciprocal loyalty from the university community.
